TopicTitle: Returned to VAB when trying to launch to runway from the VAB, but unable to build or move the camera and i have the sound playing from the runway

Articles.Content:
• KSP Version:      0.1.1.0.21572
  • Operating System:      Windows 11
  • CPU and GPU models:    i5-11400H   RTX 3050Ti
  • (See attached Video) When Launching to the runway i get the loading screen for the runway but i am put back into the VAB. It is if i am stuck in between the VAB menu and being on the runway as i have the building page and a portion of the craft i launched in front of me in the VAB but i can't move the camera or grab my vehicle but i can use the blueprint style camera box that lets you view your craft directly from the side, top, bottom etc. I also can't build but i can grab parts from the parts menu. The Sun shines through the VAB while this is happening too like the walls are none existent. I have the wind noise from the runway. When i press ESC to bring up the menu for save/load/quit etc i get the sound but not the menu.
  • Inconsistent Bugs that happen while this is happening: Sometimes i have the UI from flying (Nav ball, time warp bar, kerbal cam etc) overlayed on the VAB when it returns me to VAB aswell as the parts menu. I get the sound play for the Kerbal speaking when you activate your engines on the runway Sometimes.
    • Expected Behavior: To be put on runway 1 and able to takeoff (or explode in a glorious fireball because i built it badly)
    • Observed Behavior: I am returned to the VAB but without the expected sounds or control over the VAB
  • Steps to Replicate: Unknown
  • Fixes / Workarounds (if known..): Unknown
  • A list of ALL mods.  If the list is long, please consider using a spoiler window: No mods
  • Other possibly useful info: This only happens with this craft, i can still launch all the other vehicles i made on this save. I can also still build new craft if i don't launch this one.  I can launch this craft if i go to KSC and launch directly to runway but the craft immediately "breaks" even though nothing has broken on the craft and if i double click on it i can still activate the engines but i don't move even though it has a thrust to weight of 2.5 and the brakes are off too. I have a feeling it is a specific part as i launch the craft a few times during the building phase to test flex and i had no issues, this is of course a theory and i will be taking parts slowly off to see if anything changes. I will post an update below if i find anything else that might be helpful to this
